title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8153.04 - Village of Fort Edward
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8153.04 - Village of Fort Edward

State Regulations
(a) Eddy

Street. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Eddy Street from the Scott

Paper Company main gate easterly to US Route 4, a distance of 0.17+- mile (900
feet). (b) US Route 4. The
northbound and southbound roadways of US Route 4 from Eddy Street southerly to

Route 197 (RM 1105+- to RM 1107+-), a distance of 0.24+- mile. (c) Route 197. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 197 from US Route 4 westerly to the Washington-Saratoga
county line (RM 1000+- to RM 1003+-), a distance of 0.30 mile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8153.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
